1.0.2.name: wordpress/comments-shortcut
1.0.2.description:
This plugin helps you to set a shortcut for the comments submiting. Such as 'Ctrl + Enter'

Features:

  • Support for WordPress 2.5
  • Shortcut key for comments
  • Custom shortcut key
  • Support various browers

Supported Languages:

  • English (default, 1.0 or higher)

Demo:

http://www.gekimoe.org/message-board#comment

Notice

If you installed an older version before, please deactive it first and reactive the newer version. This may help you to clear up the depreacted options.
